CheckTitle: Ensure alert is configured for rds configuration changes
Description: Ensures that an alert is configured in SLS to monitor and notify on RDS instance configuration changes.
Risk: Unauthorized RDS configuration changes can weaken database security or cause service disruptions.

Recommendation.Text: Create and enable an alert in SLS to monitor rds configuration changes from ActionTrail logs.

Notes: This check looks for enabled alerts that monitor rds configuration changes.
